name: GeometryShooter
description:
Do you hate math? Especially geometry? Then you will love this game!

Fight with those pesky geometric shapes with your trusted guns.

A wave based shooter game with 5 differents guns against 5 different geometric shapes and an unique boss fight.

Will you be able to survive the 15 waves or fail like you did in geometry class back in highschool?

Press space to dash, mouse for gun control and movement keys to move.
